What's going on with Jsse?  Well, since I just started my fall
semester, Jesse has gotten moved to the back-burner at the moment
while I play catch-up with my classes (that'll teach me to check the
calendar more often for when classes start so I don't miss the 1st 2
days).

I'm not too happy with my circles not being round:

http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/glad/thumbnails/SCEN122.bmp - 833 kb
http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/glad/thumbnails/SCEN122.jpg -  55 kb
http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/glad/thumbnails/SCEN122.gif -  23 kb

which is tempting me to make the images even bigger.  Anyways, Does
anyone think the jpg (ok, this is getting ridiculous; I keep wanting
to type jpb instead of jpg) pic looks ugly compared to the other two?
 Just taking an opinion poll before I start adding the code to do
something about only saving in bmp format.
